document.full_text: with fervor in his eyes, 17-year-old abubakir issa said he was ready to fight for muammar gaddafi with a rifle he was given last week as part of the libyan leader's drive to create a civilian armed force.
document.title: risky divisions in libya's key tribal stronghold
lines_and_colors: with fervor in his eyes, 17-year-old abubakir issa said he was ready to fight for muammar gaddafi with a rifle he was given last week as part of the libyan leader's drive to create a civilian armed force.
